pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Fancybox markdown extensionThis markdown extension creates [fancybox images](http://fancybox.net/).### Markdown```md!![Title](image.png "Description")```### HTML```html```## Using it with mkdocsEnable it in mkdocs.yml```ymlmarkdown_extensions: - fancyboxmd```Enable fancybox in mkdocs.yml```yml# Cssextra_css: - https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/fancyapps/fancybox@3.5.7/dist/jquery.fancybox.min.css# Extra javascriptextra_javascript: - https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jquery@3.5.1/dist/jquery.min.js - https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/fancyapps/fancybox@3.5.7/dist/jquery.fancybox.min.js```## ConfigurationIt supports one configuration option `preview_width` which defaults to `600px`.
